name: Daedric Minefield
description: Surprise your foes by placing 5 volatile Daedric mines around you, which take 3 seconds to arm and last for 15 seconds.  When a mine is triggered it explodes, dealing 2700 Magic Damage and immobilizing the enemy for 2 seconds.
effectLines: You place 5 mines around you instead of 3.
coefDescription: Surprise your foes by placing 5 volatile Daedric mines around you, which take 3 seconds to arm and last for 15 seconds.  When a mine is triggered it explodes, dealing $1 Magic Damage and immobilizing the enemy for 2 seconds.
rawDescription:

When a mine is triggered it explodes, dealing <<2>> and immobilizing the enemy for <<3>>.
